# Textbook and Assigned Readings

The textbook below [@r4ds] is not required but will be referred to throughout the course. It is available online and for free. A hardcopy of the text is on reserve at the university library. 

[R for Data Science](https://r4ds.had.co.nz/)

When there are assigned articles or readings, these will be posted 2-3 days before the corresponding lecture under the Lectures tab of this course website.
